ygData.subject: RE: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: For suggestion #1, the intent was to get the same heal/stamina effect without having to weave/use up two song slots. The idea of a bard petition was suggested
ygData.messageBody:
For suggestion #1, the intent was to get the same heal/stamina effect
without having to weave/use up two song slots.

The idea of a bard petition was suggested last week. I think that most of
us would be satisfied if Verant just gave us an official answer to the
questions that you stated. If they were to acknowledge that problems
existed and that they were working on it then I would be happy with that.
Perhaps instead of a petition for the items you listed we just send them a
list of our concerns. That would probably have a better chance of getting a
response than a class petition would.

As I stated in the original message, Verant giving bards the ability to bind
will probably never happen. I threw it out there because if I didn't
someone else would have. I figured it would be best to go ahead and get it
out of the way.

Galtin of E'ci

> >>1) A combination heal/stamina song that combines Jaxan's and Hymn. The
> >>power of the song can either be the same as the two original songs or
> toned
> >>down versions, perhaps 75% of the original values.
>
> If you want the combined power of these songs, why don't you just twist
> them
> together? Or are you saying that you'll like the equivelent of being able
> to play an extra song at the same time?
>
> If we were to generate a petition, I think more important issues should be
> covered:
>
> 1) Where the hell are our missing songs?!
> 2) Why do half our skills cap at such a ridiculously low level that they
> aren't even worth using?
> 3) Is our level 22 song Alenias Disenchanting Melody broken? If not, what
> the hell is it supposed to do?
> 4) Why do certain of our songs (Lullaby, Pixie Strike) work find against
> monsters, but have absolutely no effects verses players in duels?
> 5) Why do our songs get stuck due to lag, or when magical effects wear off
> (i.e. Guise of the Deciever)
> 6) Why the $#%@#$ does my drum still look like a small wooden twig? And
> why
> does a mino horn now look like a small burlap sack?
> 7) How about some high level bard quests?
>
>
